name: Igglybuff
author: Keiko Fukuyama

attacks.name: Energy Heal
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your Pokémon with an Energy card attached to it. Remove 1 damage counter from that Pokémon.

rule_box: If your Active Pokémon is a Baby Pokémon and your opponent announces an attack, your opponent flips a coin (before doing anything else). If tails, your opponent’s turn ends.
